uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

location.description: Location where the system is installed.

regulatory_domain.description: Regulatory domain where the system is operating on.

device_operation_mode.description: Mode in which the device is operating on.

uplink_vlan_id.description: Vlan via which Central is connected. This is applicable only when device_operation_mode is DOM_CLOUD or DOM_CLOUD_WITH_SUPPORT. This won't be available for non Central uses case.

uplink_ip_address.description: Ip address of Vlan via which Central is connected. This is applicable only when device_operation_mode is DOM_CLOUD or DOM_CLOUD_WITH_SUPPORT. This won't be available for non Central uses case.

default_gateway.description: The global IPV4 default gateway. Input octets as 0.0.0.0 to reset.

rollback_to_good_config.description: Central connectivity loss - rollback to good config info/status.
